CustomField.description: Launch the Pay Batch Manager user interface.
CustomField.formula: If ( NOT ( ISBLANK ( tc9_pr__Pay_Batch__c ) ) , If( CONTAINS ( Text ( tc9_pr__Pay_Batch__r.tc9_pr__Status__c ) , "Creating") , IMAGE(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_260, FIND( '/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_260))+ "resource/tc9_pr__Payroll_resources/AUS_Payroll/Images/LaunchButton_Grey.png", "Manager") , HYPERLINK("/one/one.app#/alohaRedirect/apex/tc9_pr__PayBatchManager?recordId="+ tc9_pr__Pay_Batch__r.Id, IMAGE(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_260, FIND( '/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_260))+ "resource/tc9_pr__Payroll_resources/AUS_Payroll/Images/" + If( CONTAINS ( Text ( tc9_pr__Status__c ) , "Failed" ) , "LaunchButton_Red.png", If( CONTAINS ( Text ( tc9_pr__Status__c ) , "Uncalculated" ) , "LaunchButton_Orange.png", If( CONTAINS ( Text ( tc9_pr__Status__c ) , "ing" ) , "LaunchButton_Green.png", "LaunchButton_Blue.png" ) ) ) ,"Manager"),"_blank")) , null )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Launch the Pay Batch Manager user interface.
CustomField.label: Pay Batch Manager
